title: Cookies Policy
subtitle: How we use cookies on our website
content: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website.
Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.

sections.title: Essential Cookies
sections.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.content: We use these cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website.

sections.title: Preference Cookies
sections.content: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make.
